title: Set alias for columns in data set, but in expression builder it still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
OB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the old column names are displayed instead of the updated aliases.
EB: When selecting the dataset in the expression builder, the updated column aliases should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new data source and a dataset. 
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'. 
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset. 
4. Open the expression builder and select the dataset. Check if the updated column aliases are displayed.
